The monthly values of the modulation parameter (in MV) reconstructed from the ground based cosmic ray data, using the procedure described in Ref.(1).
Local Interstellar spectrum (LIS) corresponds to Ref. (2)

References:
[1] Usoskin, I.G., A. Gil, G.A. Kovaltsov, A. Mishev, V.V. Mikhailov, Heliospheric modulation of cosmic rays during the neutron monitor era: Calibration using PAMELA data for 2006-2010, J. Geophys. Res. Space Phys., 122, 3875-3887, 2017, doi: 10.1002/2016JA023819
[2] Vos, E.E., and M. S. Potgieter), New modeling of galactic proton modulation during the minimum of solar cycle 23/24, Astrophys. J., 815, 119, 2015. doi:10.1088/0004-637X/815/2/119.

Year    Phi (MV)
